name: DLL Injection with Tracker.exe
description: This rule detects DLL injection and execution via LOLBAS - Tracker.exe
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\tracker.exe OR process.pe.description:Tracker) AND process.command_line:(*\ \/d\ * OR *\ \/c\ *))`
